name: mri_gcut
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Skull stripping algorithm based on graph cuts.

inputs.description: Input brain volume file, e.g. T1.mgz
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Use voxels with intensity 110 as white matter mask (when applied on T1.mgz, FreeSurfer only)
inputs.name: White matter mask flag

inputs.description: Intersect the skull-stripped 'in_filename' and an existing skull-stripped volume specified by 'filename', storing the result in 'out_filename'.
inputs.name: Mult filename

inputs.description: Set threshold to value (%) of WM intensity, where the value should be >0 and <1; defaults to 0.40.
inputs.name: Threshold value

output-files.description: The output file containing the skull-stripped brain volume.
output-files.name: Output mask file
